tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: (2/3) Read Pan American Union Director John Barrett’s report: “Since the 1st of July, when American sanitary officers assumed control, there have been upon the whole Isthmus along the line of the canal only 10 cases of yellow fever.” go.usa.gov/xvK7E #FRUS #FSIatHome
